description: This dashboard provides detailed metrics of the companion computer system and network resources.

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "systemdata"."uptime_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."users_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'buffered' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."load_shortterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."load_midterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."load_longterm" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT (100- mean("value")) FROM "systemdata"."cpu_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'idle' AND "instance" = '0' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT (100- mean("value")) FROM "systemdata"."cpu_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'idle' AND "instance" = '1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT (100- mean("value")) FROM "systemdata"."cpu_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'idle' AND "instance" = '2' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT (100- mean("value")) FROM "systemdata"."cpu_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'idle' AND "instance" = '3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'buffered' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'slab_recl' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "systemdata"."memory_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'slab_unrecl' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'running' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'blocked' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'sleeping' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'stopped' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'paging' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'zombies' AND "type" = 'ps_state' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "systemdata"."processes_value" WHERE "type" = 'fork_rate' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) FROM "systemdata"."contextswitch_value" WHERE "type" = 'contextswitch' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) FROM "systemdata"."irq_value" WHERE "type" = 'irq' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "type_instance" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s)*8 FROM "systemdata"."interface_rx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s)*8 FROM "systemdata"."interface_tx" WHERE "type"='if_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), instance fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"),1s) AS "value" FROM "systemdata"."protocols_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'InSegs' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"),1s) AS "value" FROM "systemdata"."protocols_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'OutSegs' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"),1s) AS "value" FROM "systemdata"."protocols_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'InDatagrams' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("value"),1s) AS "value" FROM "systemdata"."protocols_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'OutDatagrams' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last(value) FROM "systemdata"."df_value" WHERE "type_instance" = 'free' AND "type" = 'df_complex' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "systemdata"."disk_read" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean(value), 1s) FROM "systemdata"."disk_write" WHERE "type" = 'disk_octets' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "instance" fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap' AND "type_instance" = 'used' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap' AND "type_instance" = 'cached' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select mean(value) FROM "systemdata"."swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap' AND "type_instance" = 'free' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) FROM "systemdata"."swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap_io' AND "type_instance" = 'in' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
select derivative(mean(value),1s) FROM "systemdata"."swap_value" WHERE "type" = 'swap_io' AND "type_instance" = 'out' AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "systemdata"."uptime_value" WITH KEY = "host"

title: System Dashboard
